features.title: Canada Startup Visa – SUV
features.description: The Canadian Startup Visa program is a unique opportunity for creative entrepreneurs worldwide to launch their innovative ideas in one of the world's most advanced markets. We will be by your side from receiving necessary support to launching and expanding your business in Canada; a path that will ultimately lead to obtaining permanent residence in Canada.

features.title: Entrepreneurship PNP
features.description: PNPs in Canada offer a great path for entrepreneurs to invest and start a business. Each province has unique criteria, and with our expertise, we help you choose the right program, prepare documents, and complete the process—leading to a successful business and permanent residency.

ourTeamText: Our team of experts is comprised of professionals who are passionate about their work, and have an extensive background in a wide variety of applications, and are willing to help at any time
PartnersDescription: At NovaNest Venture, we welcome strategic affiliations with international firms and qualified influencers alike. As an approved affiliate, you will receive co-branded support and future representations that wield substantial influence within the business landscape. To become an affiliate, please complete our free questionnaire for our confidential review.
AboutUsContent: We are a network of international investors, serial entrepreneurs, and skilled professionals who support startups and businesses in transforming their ideas into reality or scaling their existing ventures. Our goal is to help them scale up so they can offer their products or services on a global level

cards.title: Investment
cards.text: At NovaNest Venture Investment Center, we focus on investing in innovative and scalable startups with international market potential and a valuation of $5 million or less. As a network of experienced angel investors, we provide not only initial funding but also strategic support in capital raising and connections to a global network of investors. Our goal is to accelerate your growth, strengthen your presence in international markets, and enhance the overall value of your business.

cards.title: Acceleration
cards.text: At NovaNest, we empower innovative startups to grow from idea to global success. Our accelerator provides mentorship, training, networking, and access to investors, helping entrepreneurs develop products, enter new markets, and achieve rapid growth. We focus on sectors such as Artificial Intelligence, Tourism, and Education, supporting startups in creating lasting impact on a global scale.

NovaNestAcademyInfo: NovaNestAcademyInfo NovaNest Academy nurtures young talent with mentoring, hands-on workshops, and practical programs to develop skills and launch ideas. Teenagers and young adults can apply to work with international mentors on real projects — apply via the link below.

specialFeatureCards.title: Mentorship
specialFeatureCards.subtitle: Become a Mentor
specialFeatureCards.text: Join our network of experienced mentors and help shape the future of innovative startups. Share your expertise, grow your professional network, and make a real impact—while enjoying financial rewards, career growth, and exclusive opportunities.
benefits: Meaningful impact on startups and society
Exclusive access to events and resources

specialFeatureCards.title: Trainee
specialFeatureCards.subtitle: Join the Team
specialFeatureCards.text: If you are talented, creative, and professional, join NovaNest and work alongside experienced mentors to help our innovative startups succeed. Share your skills, collaborate with expert teams, and make a real impact on the growth and development of emerging businesses.
benefits: Professional growth and learning from mentors teams
Strengthening your personal brand and professional portfolio
Participation in innovative and socially impactful projects
Access to exclusive NovaNest events and resources

logos.description: Since 1396, at the same time as Farazman was established, we have been working with Isfahan Azad University in the field of student investment and acceleration.

commentsData.name: Jane Doe
commentsData.commentDescription: For me, my time spent working with NovaNest Venture with this extremely competent staff was an experience that I will never forget.

commentsData.name: Bob Smith
commentsData.commentDescription: NovaNest Venture is home to a youthful and inventive workforce that is brimming with enthusiasm for all they do.

LatestStartupsList.title: LANDA TRIP
LatestStartupsList.description: Landa trip is an innovative start-up company that creates, promotes, and runs useful educational courses for all interested people and businesses.

LatestStartupsList.title: DIACO
LatestStartupsList.description: Diaco is an open innovation platform which acts as an intermediary between technology seekers and providers to fulfill their technological demands.

LatestStartupsList.title: VISION RAFT
LatestStartupsList.description: This is Vision Raft, a VR platform focused on education and entertainment of the young ones which acts to enhance their learning quality.

cards.subTitle: HANDI CRAFT
cards.text: Using Artificial Intelligence, Augmented Reality, and NFT, Landa Handicrafts aims to build a safe communication bridge between makers and purchasers.

cards.subTitle: AUTILAB
cards.text: Otism is an art movement that highlights nature’s beauty and the human form through organic shapes, earthy tones, and fluid lines. Emerging in the 21st century, it evokes tranquility and connection, inviting viewers to reflect on their bond with the environment.

cards.subTitle: PREVENTI GENE
cards.text: Using Artificial Intelligence, Augmented Reality, and NFT, Landa Handicrafts aims to build asafe communication bridge between makers and purchasers.
